Summary: mirror like image as if it was reflecting or taking in the suns energy.no paticular shape;just shiny.another person was with me and witnessed the same thing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in ...?
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a boring day of travel on the interstate;looking around and enjoying the sorroundings.and then i notice a mirror like image in the sky...it was as if it were invisable but could see it .....it may have been reflecting its souroundings....who knows? but 1 thing is 4 sure ...both of us cant be wrong and i dont care if any one believes me or not ....i know what we seen...and that is final.looked nothing like what u see on tv.very strange in deed....and it was gone in a blink of an eye..when i said 2 my brother in law do u see that ..what is that; we were in awww...and then it was gone in a blink
